Class CheckDigitValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • CheckDigitValidation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullCheckDigitValidation, PieceWiseCheckDigitValidation

    abstract class CheckDigitValidation
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class responsible for check digit validation using modulo-97 operation. Full algorithm defined at:
    See Also:
    Validating the IBAN.

      • convertIbanToNumber

        java.lang.String convertIbanToNumber(java.lang.String iban)
        Converts the IBAN to reordered numeric representation for further validation. Second and third steps from the IBAN validation algorithm as defined in the link above.
        Parameters:
        iban - original IBAN
        Returns:
        string representation of reordered IBAN
